name: Vocabulary Builder Game
description: An interactive educational game to improve English vocabulary through multiple game modes including definitions, synonyms, antonyms, and sentence completion
author: Your Name
features: Multiple game modes (Definition, Synonym, Antonym, Sentence Completion)
Progressive scoring system with streak bonuses
Word information display after each question
game_modes: Match Definition - Match words with their definitions
Find Synonym - Identify words with similar meanings
Complete Sentence - Fill in the blank with correct word
Find Antonym - Identify words with opposite meanings
